data.name: Alice
data.text: 可以，香港的博士再去别的学校读博后

data.name: Bob
data.text:
帮发一个招聘：香港科技大学广州校园杜娟老师招收博士生，详情：Dr. Juan Du’s research group at HKUST(GZ) is seeking talented and self-motivated PhD students to join her research group. Applicants from top universities with a background in Industrial Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Automation, Applied Statistics, Machine Learning, or a related field are encouraged to apply. The interested applicants can send your information (e.g. CV, transcripts, and/or TOEFL/IELTS scores) to juandu@ust.hk. More details about Dr. Juan Du can be found in
https://www.mae.hkust.edu.hk/en/people/faculty/detail/du-juan 
More details about admission can be found in 
https://hkust-gz.edu.cn/admission

data.name: Bob
data.text: 感兴趣可以康康，这个老师人不错，和她做过实习

data.name: 洞主
data.text: Re Alice: 博后好run吗？dz是cs的

data.name: Carol
data.text: Re Bob: 广州校区什么水平

data.name: Alice
data.text: Re 洞主: 我认识的cs没有读博士的……

data.name: Bob
data.text: Re Carol: 工资，毕业证等与本部一致

post.text: 话说hk phd可以曲线run吗，有无懂哥指点一下的
